name: Config 2021 Collaboration Creature Lab
description:
This FigJam board is the backdrop for a workshop that took place at Config 2021.


You'll find an introduction board, as well as a research findings board where participants can engage with the takeaways. These takeaways were based on interviews with designers, product managers, and developers; these "modes of collaboration" represent the different mindsets people bring to their cross-functional relationships.


Finally, the workshop transitions to a build stage -- where each participant builds a “collaboration creature” that represents the energy they hope to inject into any team they’re a part of. The workshop is part learning, part reflection, and part sticker collage!
